remarks: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint).  Version of ~ dral2 using ~ ax-c11 .  (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dral2-o.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dral2-o $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. z ph <-> A. z ps ) ) $.
